import React from 'react' import styles from './index.less'; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import {observer,inject} from 'mobx-react' const FriendDesc = (props) => { const { name , imgSrc, chatStore} = props console.log(chatStore.chatFlag) chatStore.changeChatFlag(true) return

{name}

id: xxx
地区:xxx
发消息
} export default inject('chatStore')(observer(FriendDesc))
